description: Loaded documents, URLs, PDFs, and CSVs stored in vector database with hybrid search.
capabilities: List loaded sources and their status
limitations: No real-time web access (use web search agent for current info)
search_tips: Use search_content for exact term matching when vector search is too broad
Use list_knowledge_sources to see what documents are loaded
